headline: The Call to Serve Is Being Unevenly Embraced
abstract: More and more, new recruits come from the same small number of counties and are the children of old recruits.
lead_paragraph: COLORADO SPRINGS â€” The sergeant in charge of one of the busiest Army recruiting centers in Colorado, Sgt. First Class Dustin Comes, joined the Army, in part, because his father served. Now two of his four children say they want to serve, too. And he will not be surprised if the other two make the same decision once they are a little older.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
